title: Iran: Indecency trial of jailed cartoonist and her lawyer for shaking hands absurd (Amnesty International ...
text: ( Source : Amnesty International Australia ) The trial of satirical cartoonist Atena Farghadani and her lawyer on a charge of 'illegitimate sexual relations falling short of adultery' after they shook hands is not only absurd and extreme but
